short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InnoBots extension component for web automation and communication with browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extension created a bridge to communicate between the InnoBots Application Service and the respective Browser. It's used to inject automation ID in DOM of the web page. Also, subsequently retrieve and element using JS. All these are used to allow web automation via scripts from InnoBots.
